job.title: Data Governance & Stewardship Analyst
job.description: stronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongThe Data Governance amp Stewardship DGampS Analyst Role is responsible for supporting a clients customer data management processes and tasks This role is responsible for assessing and improving the quality of a pharmaceutical clients customer data Physicians Organizations etc Using a combination of IQVIA data and tools a DGampS Analyst work with clients data within their systems MDM CRM etc andor spreadsheets to review and verify data The DGampS Analyst works closely with the client on both Data Stewardship and Data Governance engagements Tasks include but are not limited to the development and documentation of business process related to data management The DGampS Analyst is responsible for providing ongoing feedback to both IQVIA management and client peers of data issues and areas that require special attention or escalation The DGampS Analyst will also be responsible for the collection and possibly the reporting out to the client on a predefined schedule all metrics and SLA performancebrbrSkills and Experience Requirementsbrbrulli Undergraduate degree or actively pursuinglili Experience with IQVIA data andor medical information desiredlili Fundamental understanding of relational databases MDM Informatica CRM technologies desiredlili Detail oriented good data entry research and analytical skillslili Analytics and Reporting experience desiredlili Strong customer service skills with excellent verbal and written communicationslili Eagerness to learn follow directions and work independentlylili Proficiency in Microsoft Office including Excel Access and Wordlili SQL experience desired but not necessarybrliulAt IQVIA we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible  to help our customers create a healthier world The advanced analytics technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70000 employees around the world who apply their insight curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way Learn more at jobsiqviacombrbrAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability status as a protected veteran or any other status protected by applicable lawbrbrIQVIA Inc provides reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities Applicants who require reasonable accommodation to submit an application for employment or otherwise participate in the application process should contact IQVIAs Talent Acquisition team at workdayrecruitingiqviacom to arrange for such an accommodationbrbr
